Articles.Content:
Why can the camera not be aimed at a specific part in KSP1?

Is there a plan to introduce a first-person camera view and detailed interior spaces in the game? If so, when can we expect these features to be implemented?

Could you consider remaking the left-click parts menu so that it is organized per part rather than per vessel? The current menu displays too many options at once, and organizing it per part would be more intuitive and user-friendly.
Try the middle mouse button to look at a specific part.

The middle mouse button works in the VAB to focus, unfortunately it doesn't work in flight like was possible in KSP1, I do hope it gets implemented in flight as well and we are able to choose where the focus lays instead of just being stuck only on the COM for focus.
